thread.section_title: Petstop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Petstop | petstop.ie
thread.title: Kat S.

author: Kat S.
title: Kat S.
text:
I can't recommend Petstop online shopping experience high enough. The shop is easy to browse,the cart remembers your previous purchases,there are monthly offers,so if you shop regularly it's easy to avail of discount and delivery is free as long as you spend at least 20.00 euros.And what is the best,your purchase will be at your doorstep next working day.
I occasionally get small free thank you gift for Christmas and special days like pet's Mother's Day,which is really charming and thoughtful.
Thank you,Petstop! :)
